messages.subject: book reviews
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I do book reviews for the Link and other publications.  I am getting them up on the web. (after they have ran elsewhere) So I thought I would share for
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I do book reviews for the Link and other publications. I am getting them up
on the web. (after they have ran elsewhere) So I thought I would share for
those who may be interested:)
Teri
